messages.raw: [W:02][S:03]This windmill has been grinding[V]to a halt for ages.[K][2]It needs a song to get it[V]spinning right, but what's the[V]use talking to you?[K][3]You don't even have an[V]instrument![K]

[W:02][S:03]That ocarina... a fine piece.[K][2]But the windmill's heart is[V]broken. It's full of rage.[V]It won't listen to a new song.[K][3]Perhaps if you knew a song of[V]healing... it might calm the[V]gears. Then I could teach you.[K]

[W:02][S:03]You... you played the song![V]The angry spirit in the gears[V]is calm now... Thank you.[K][2]Now, listen well... for what[V]I will teach you is the song[V]that powers this windmill.[K][3]It is the Song of Storms! The[V]very melody that calls the[V]rain itself! Listen...[K]
[W:02][S:03]The windmill spins once more,[V]thanks to you, [L].[K][2]The storms answer your call now.[V]Use the song wisely.[K]
